“ A skilled workforce is 
essential to the national and 
global transition to a low-
carbon economy. Schnitzer 
Academy aims to bring 
talented individuals to the 
metals recycling industry, 
providing a platform for 
sustainable workforce 
development in our local 
communities and beyond. ”
— Tam ara Lundgren, 
   Schnitzer Chairman, President and CEO
 52     2022 Sustainability Report Company              Environment              People              Community              Appendix
